ActJudges Act
SubjectSuzanne Marceau ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Louis Marceau **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to SUZANNE MARCEAU, survivor of the Hon. Louis Marceau, a judge of the Federal Court of Appeal, effective November 27, 2018.
